name: Gadus S2  Steel Mill Grease 2
description: Special Multi Purpose and Steel Mill Grease

globalDocs.name: Gadus S2 Steel Mill Grease 2 EN TDG V1.1 04-Aug-2020

localDocs.name: Gadus S2 Steel Mill Grease 2 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.0 18-JUN-2020

marketing:
Shell Gadus S2  Steel Mill Grease 2 is formulated with high viscosity index mineral oils containing performance additives that enhance load carrying capacity and corrosion protection.
Shell Gadus S2 Steel Mill Grease is especially suitable for heavy-duty bearings operating at high
temperature and under severe load.
